1. DynASM module of LuaJIT version 2.0.3+: http://luajit.org/dynasm.html
   Requires also following packages (Debian/Ubuntu): lua5.1, lua-bitops
2. Capstone disassembling library version 3.0.2+:
   http://www.capstone-engine.org/
   Debian/Ubuntu package: libcapstone-dev > 3.0.2
3. Also requires following Debian/Ubuntu packages: libunistring-dev,
